subject: [Lab 04] Q8: Squares only
content:
Q8: Squares only

Please post all questions you have below concerning Q8: Squares only in the follow-ups.

If you are stuck on this question, feel free to read through the follow-up responses to see if you can draw any ideas from them.

threads.question: can we use sqrt? or do we need to use pow?

follow-ups.feedback: I don't know, but I know we can get the square root without using sqrt or pow.
You can use them if you wish, or you can also use `** `
